summary: Provides an interface to interact with a Neato robot vacuum, exposing its current power state, battery charge, cleaning status, and device name, and allowing commands such as start, pause, stop, turn on/off, and return to charging dock.
business_intent: Enable smartâ€‘home platforms and automation systems to monitor and control Neato vacuum cleaners remotely, facilitating scheduled cleaning, energy management, and integration with other home devices.
